short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Google Slides with live quizzes and polls for interactive presentations, fostering engagement and real-time feedback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your presentations to new heights of interactivity and engagement with LivePolls!

Empower your audience to participate actively and enhance their learning experience without ever leaving your Google Slides presentation.

âœ¨ With LivePolls, you can:

- Gamify virtual events and captivate your audience's attention.
- Gather real-time feedback digitally to gauge audience sentiment instantly.
- Measure audience engagement with interactive questions and analyze responses in real-time.
- Utilize polls, quizzes, and trivia for enjoyable and inclusive meetings.

ðŸš€ How does it work?

- Login to your LivePolls account or create a new one - it's completely free!
- Create engaging quizzes or polls and seamlessly embed them into your slides.
- Start your presentation and effortlessly collect audience responses.

In detail guide - https://www.questionpro.com/help/livepolls/google-slides-chrome-extension.html

Experience the power of our AI builder, allowing you to generate Quiz or Poll questions on any topic instantly.

Choose from a plethora of question types such as Multiple Choice, open-ended with live voting, word cloud, and more. Plus, stay tuned as we continually add new and exciting question types to keep your audience engaged and entertained.
